name: ddayver/photo-rigma-biz
description: Open source photo gallery with multi-DBMS support

suggest.ext-gmagick: Alternative to Imagick for image processing
suggest.ext-imagick: For advanced image processing (alternative to GD)
suggest.ext-intl: For advanced string handling and transliteration

post-update-cmd: php -r "\$isGit=is_dir('.git'); if(\$isGit){ \$changes=shell_exec('git diff --name-only HEAD@{1} HEAD 2>/dev/null'); \$vendorOnly=\$changes&&!preg_match('/^(?!vendor\\/).+/m',\$changes); echo \$vendorOnly?'=== Packages updated ===':'=== Code updated ==='; } else { \$vendorTime=filemtime('vendor/composer'); \$codeTime=max(array_map('filemtime',array_merge(glob('src/*'),glob('sql/*/*')))); echo \$vendorTime>\$codeTime?'=== Packages updated ===':'=== Code updated ==='; }"
post-package-update: php -r "if(isset(\$argv[1])){echo 'Package updated: '.\$argv[1].PHP_EOL.'Actions:'.PHP_EOL.'1. Check changelog'.PHP_EOL.'2. Test functionality'.PHP_EOL;}"
check-updates: php -r "\$found=false; foreach(['mysql','pgsql','sqlite'] as \$type){ if(file_exists('sql/'.\$type.'/update/')&&count(glob('sql/'.\$type.'/update/*.sql'))){\$found=true;}} if(\$found){echo 'WARNING: Pending DB migrations!'.PHP_EOL;}"
